channel.title: HP TouchPad
channel.description:
I'm jumping on the wagon a little late, but can anyone find me a US seller that has them for the discount price that isn't sold out yet? I've checked all the major ones (BestBuy, Staples, OfficeDepot/Max, HP Home, etc.) but i'm sure you guys know about some smaller ones that might still have them.
16 or 32GB, it doesn't matter to me

item.title: HP TouchPad
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“monger, post:4, topic:412102”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=513355.msg3727042#msg3727042 date=1314331970]
Just wait a month, it will be half the price.
[/quote]

HP is no longer in the tablet business, hence why they are sold out. They dropped the price to $99. It won’t be possible to buy them from a shop in a month, if it’s even possible now.

OT:
I’d suggest trying an auction site, or finding a not so popular Walmart or Target. I saw some of them at Walmart a few days ago, but I doubt they’re still there.[/quote]

I live in a small town, so that might be a possibility, but I won’t get payed for another week so I was hoping to charge it to PayPal’s BillMeLater service. HP Home hasn’t fully stopped offering them, they just say they are out of stock. HP Business says they are out of stock and wont be getting anymore, so hopefully I got some time.

Read full topic

item.title: HP TouchPad

Just wait a month, it will be half the price.

HP is no longer in the tablet business, hence why they are sold out. They dropped the price to $99. It won’t be possible to buy them from a shop in a month, if it’s even possible now.

OT:
